00041   class SIMD_API Condition {
00042   public:
00043     Condition(dds::peer::ConditionImpl* ac);
00044     virtual ~Condition();
00045 
00046   public:
00047     bool
00048     operator==(const Condition& other);
00049 
00050     inline dds::peer::ConditionImpl*
00051     operator->() { return cond_.get(); }
00052 
00053     inline const dds::peer::ConditionImpl*
00054     operator->() const { return cond_.get(); }
00055 
00056   protected:
00057     template <typename CT2, typename CT1> friend CT2 downcast(CT1&);
00058     template <typename CT2, typename CT1> bool can_downcast(CT1& orig);
00059     ::boost::shared_ptr<dds::peer::ConditionImpl> cond_;
00060   };
00061 
00062   DEFINE_HANDLE_BODY_TRAITS(Condition, dds::peer::ConditionImpl)
00063     
00064   class SIMD_API ReadCondition: public Condition {
00065   public:
00066     ReadCondition(dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl* arci);
00067     virtual ~ReadCondition();
00068 
00069   public:
00070     bool
00071     operator==(const ReadCondition& other);
00072 
00073     inline dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl*
00074     operator->() { return pcond_; }
00075 
00076     inline const dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl*
00077     operator->() const { return pcond_; }
00078 
00079   protected:
00080     // Notice that reference counting is
00081     // maintained by the parent class.
00082     template <typename CT2, typename CT1> friend CT2 downcast(CT1&);
00083     template <typename CT2, typename CT1> bool can_downcast(CT1& orig);
00084     ReadCondition();
00085     dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl* pcond_;
00086   };
00087 
00088   DEFINE_HANDLE_BODY_TRAITS(ReadCondition, dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl)
00089 
00090   class SIMD_API QueryCondition: public ReadCondition {
00091   protected:
00092     QueryCondition(dds::peer::QueryConditionImpl* qcond);
00093     virtual ~QueryCondition();
00094 
00095   public:
00096     bool
00097     operator==(const ReadCondition& other);
00098 
00099     inline dds::peer::QueryConditionImpl*
00100     operator->() { return pcond_; }
00101 
00102     inline const dds::peer::QueryConditionImpl*
00103     operator->() const { return pcond_; }
00104 
00105   protected:
00106     // Refcount maintained by the root class.
00107     template <typename CT2, typename CT1> friend CT2 downcast(CT1&);
00108     template <typename CT2, typename CT1> bool can_downcast(CT1& orig);
00109     QueryCondition();
00110     dds::peer::QueryConditionImpl* pcond_;
00111   };

00121   // @TODO: This is a quick and dirty hack which should be implemented
00122   // in a  more general manner and w/o breaking encapsulation.
00123   // For the time being it suffice since the only class that ever require
00124   // downcast are Conditions.
00125   template <typename CT2, typename CT1> CT2 downcast(CT1& orig) {
00126     typename handle_body_ptr<CT1>::type b1 = orig.operator->();
00127     typename handle_body_ptr<CT2>::type b2 =
00128       dynamic_cast<typename handle_body_ptr<CT2>::type>(b1);
00129     CT2* pct2 = 0;
00130     if (b2 != 0) {
00131       pct2 = new CT2();
00132       pct2->cond_ = orig.cond_;
00133       pct2->pcond_ = b2;
00134     }
00135     Assert::postcondition(pct2 != 0, "downcast_condition: Attempted invalid conversion", __FILE__);
00136     return *pct2;
00137   }
00138 
00139   template <typename CT2, typename CT1> bool can_downcast(CT1& orig) {
00140     typename handle_body_ptr<CT1>::type b1 = orig.operator->();
00141     typename handle_body_ptr<CT2>::type b2 =
00142       dynamic_cast<typename handle_body_ptr<CT2>::type>(b1);
00143     return b2 != 0;
00144   }
00145 
00146   template<typename ARG, typename FUNCTOR>
00147   class TReadCondition: public ReadCondition {
00148   public:
00149     TReadCondition(boost::shared_ptr<DDS::ReadCondition> rcond,
00150                    const ARG& arg, const FUNCTOR& f) :
00151       ReadCondition(new ::dds::peer::TReadConditionImpl<ARG, FUNCTOR>(rcond, arg, f)) {
00152       }
00153       
00154       virtual ~TReadCondition() {
00155       }
00156       
00157     public:
00158     inline dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl*
00159       operator->() { return pcond_; }
00160     
00161     inline const dds::peer::ReadConditionImpl*
00162     operator->() const { return pcond_; }
00163   };
